title: Gunfire Samurai
description: This a previously-published edition of ASIN B01N951KHU.Bestseller in Asian Historical Fiction!......A terrifying new weapon is unleashed on the people of Japan - a country already on the brink of destruction. Hundreds of thousands of charred bodies pepper the streets. And a disturbing cover-up is slowly unraveling. .Behind the scenes, the emperor sends a covert agent to investigate and take down the terrorists. But an underground agenda may derail the mission. Concealed behind the palace walls are legions of spies. .Mikasa Yamakazi is a battle-tested warrior, but he may prove to be ill-equipped for saving a country where the line between enemy and foe is blurred. Danger could come in the form of a sickly child, a handicapped woman, or even a blind man. And there are foul beasts that lurk in the shadows, stalking him, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce..Now armed with a secret weapon, he heads south. But a hidden secret, that he alone carries, could threaten to derail the entire mission. And the fallout could mean the end of the world as he knows it. ... ... ...
author: Sean Bela
